item.title: Teleport Bug?
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

Well, i have basically no idea what you mean, but here ill make you a home code.
this is an easier way to do it.

	public void home() {
		toX = 3093;
		toY = 3491;
		heightLevel = 0;
	}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home") && (playerRights >= 0)) 
{
home();
sendMessage("You Teleport Home.");
}

Notice i added to parenthesis to the end of:

playerRights >= 0

Anyway if its a glitch for ANY teleports, It can be the heightlevel, or just a bug.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport Bug?
item.dc:creator: @LeechYourStuffPlease LeechYourStuffPlease
item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

Probally only in 317s.
But when you use a command to teleport to an area like
::home
And walk and use it again
It glitches you and like walks you out of the map but when really your next to someone who doesn’t even see you.
I tried

	}
	if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("testing") && playerRights >= 0)
		{
		if(teleblock == true){
		sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting.");
		}
		else
		{
		teleportToX = 0000;
		teleportToY = 0000;
		teleportToX = 3093;
		teleportToY = 3491;
		sendMessage("You teleport to Home.");
		}
	}

Reason so if it telies you somewere else before it teleports you home it shouldn’t glitch like that.
Didn’t work :C

Read full topic
